title: Peerio
signupHeader: Messages and files. Simple and secure.
signupIntro: Peerio is a simple and secure way to send messages, share files, and store documents online. Everything gets encrypted before being sent to the cloud, so nobody but you and those you share with ever have access to your data.
loginFailedText: If you are using a device Password, please try using your Master Password instead.
infoAlertPassphrase:
For stronger security, Peerio uses a randomly generated Master Password.

You are the only one who knows this Master Password! If you lose it, you will permanently lose access to your account. We recommend writing your Master Password down on paper, or storing it in a secure password manager.
infoAlertPassphraseMobile: For stronger security, Peerio uses a randomly generated Master Password. You are the only one who knows this Master Password! If you lose it, you will permanently lose access to your account. We recommend writing your Master Password down on paper, or storing it in a secure password manager.
signupPassphraseConfirmText:
• Only you know this Master Password.
  • If you lose it, your data will be lost forever.
  • Store your Master Password somewhere safe!

    • Please enter your Master Password in order to continue.
errorText: Your request could not be completed.
registerAccountErrorText: Sorry, we could not register your account right now. Please restart Peerio and try again in a few minutes.
signupAccountConfirmationEmail: Please check your email for a Peerio account confirmation code and enter it below. If you do not see a message, please check your spam folder.
signupAccountConfirmationPhone: A confirmation code has been sent via SMS to the mobile number you provided. Please make sure your mobile number contains your country code as well as an area code.
signupConfirmationCodeExpiredText: Your confirmation code has expired. Please restart Peerio and try signing up again.
setAPeerioPIN: Set a Password for this device
signupPeerioPIN: Instead of entering your Master Password each time you login, you can choose a shorter Device Password that will only work on this device. If you forget your Device Password you can use your Master Password to set a new one. You will always need your Master Password to login on a new device.
accountRateLimitedText: This account is temporarily unavailable because it has made too many server requests. Please wait a few minutes and try again.
accountBlacklistedText: This account is temporarily suspended. In order to regain access, please contact support@peerio.com.
computerTimeSyncText: An error occurred and your message was not sent. If you experience this problem repeatedly, please make sure that your computer's clock is set to the correct time.
welcomeToAccountText: Peerio lets you send messages securely, as well as store and manage your files and documents. Here's how you can get started.
welcomeToAccountList1: Add contacts by selecting the Contacts tab and clicking the Add Contact button on the left.
welcomeToAccountList2: Start conversations by clicking the Compose Message button on the left. Conversations can include as many contacts as you like â€” and everything is encrypted end to end.
welcomeToAccountList3: Store your files on Peerio by selecting the Files tab and clicking the Upload Files button on the left. Your files will be encrypted and ready to access on your other devices or share with contacts.
welcomeToAccountListSearch: The search bar at the top of the window makes it easy to go through your messages, files, and contacts all in one swoop. Give it a shot!
filesSidebarUploadFileSubtitle: or drag and drop to upload
logoutConfirmText: Please make sure you do not have any unsaved data prior to logging out.
participantHasLeft: This participant has left the conversation.
newMessageErrorText: Your message could not be sent.
conversationHasNoFiles: No files have been shared in this conversation yet.
filesWillAppearHere: Files will be listed here for quick access.
messageCouldNotBeSentTo: Your message could not be sent to the following contacts:
messageDecryptedError: Your contact attempted to send a message, but it could not be properly received by your account.
removeConversationsText: Warning: You will no longer receive any messages or files shared within the conversation.
newMessageRecipientsErrorText: Please enter at least one recipient to send your message.
noParticipantsLeft: There are no participants left in this conversation.
quotaErrorText: You do not have enough space in your Peerio account. Try deleting other files first, or upgrade your account to include more storage.
sizeErrorText: Peerio currently does not support files larger than 400MB.
removeFilesText: Files will be permanently deleted from your account, but will still be visible to users you've shared them with.
destroyFilesText: Files will be removed from your account and the accounts of anyone you have shared them with.
destroyFilesOwnerError: Cannot destroy files you do not own
destroyFilesOwnerErrorText: Destroying files removes them from every account they have been shared with. Only a file's owner can do that. Please try deleting the file instead.
fileUploadErrorText: Please check your connection and try again.
dragAndDropUploadText: Your files will be encrypted and uploaded to your personal cloud.
downloadFileErrorText: Oops! An error has occurred, please try again later.
avatarTooltip: User avatars allow you to verify the cryptographic identity of your contacts. If a contact's avatar changes, please contact them to verify it again before communicating with them over Peerio.
noContactsText: Select a contact, or get started by adding a friend.
acceptContactRequestText: Choose whether to allow this user to message you and share files with you securely over Peerio.
addContactInfoText: Sending messages and sharing files with your friends begins by adding them as contacts. If your friend is not a Peerio user, an invitation will be sent to their address. You can add a user by specifying their username, email address or mobile number.
addContactInfoAvatarText: Every Peerio user has a special avatar that identifies them. Think of it as their digital fingerprint. If a Peerio user's avatar changes, they may have changed their Master Password, or their account may have been compromised.
usernameEmailOrPhone: Username, email address, or mobile number
addContactRequestSentText: A contact request has been sent to the username you have entered.
addContactInviteSentText: An invitation has been sent to your contact.
addContactErrorText: Contact could not be added. Please double-check the information and try again.
removeContactText: You will no longer be able to securely communicate with each other on Peerio. Are you sure?
removeContactError: Unable to remove contact. Please try again.
twoFactorAuthSetupText: Use your favorite authenticator app to scan the QR code below. Peerio recommends either Authy or FreeOTP. See how two-factor authentication works with Peerio.
twoFactorAuthInfoText: Two-factor authentication helps keep your account safe by requiring two different kinds of login information. Please enter the six-digit code from your mobile device to continue.
twoFactorAuthConfirm: After scanning the QR code, enter the six-digit code generated by your mobile device to confirm setup.
twoFactorAuthIncorrectText: The code you have entered is incorrect. Please try again.
twoFactorAuthConfirmedText: From now on, you will be asked to enter a code generated by your mobile device when you login for the first time in a day, or from a new location. Please make sure you do not lose your mobile device.
twoFactorAuthCannotDisable: Unable to turn off two-factor authentication.
twoFactorAuthDisabledText: You can now log in using only your password. For enhanced security, consider turning two-factor authentication back on in the future.
subject: Subject
name: Name
couldNotConfirmAddress: Please double-check the confirmation code you entered.
couldNotAddAddress: This address could not be added. Please double-check it.
couldNotUpdateName: Your name could not be updated. Please try again.
confirmedLanguageText: Your new language will be available once you restart Peerio.
confirmedAddressText: Thank you for taking the time to confirm your new Peerio address.
deleteAccountText: Deleting your Peerio account will permanently destroy all your information, and you will not be able to reclaim this username in the future.
deleteAccountConfirmText: Are you sure? You will lose all your data and never be able to reclaim this username.
accountSettingsTwoFactorAuthText: Peerio can pair with your mobile device to provide additional account security.
receiveMessageNotifications: Send me message notifications to my primary address.
useSounds: Play a sound when I receive a new notification.
sendReadReceipts: Notify my contacts when I read their messages.
peerioPINUpdatedText: Your Password for this device has been updated.
peerioPINRemovedText: The Password assigned to this device has been removed.
updateAvailableText: A new update is available for Peerio! Updates bring cool new features, as well as reliability improvements. Would you like to update now?
updateAvailableLinuxText: A new update is available for Peerio! Updates bring cool new features, as well as reliability improvements. Please use your package manager to update, or click through for instructions.
updateAvailableCriticalText: A critical Peerio update is available. For your security, you may not proceed until you install the latest update.
updateAvailableCriticalLinuxText: A critical Peerio update is available. For your security, you may not proceed until you install the latest update. Please use your package manager to update, or click through for instructions.
TOFUNotMatchErrorText: Warning! Some of your contacts have changed their identities. Before communicating with them, please make sure to verify their Peerio avatar icon in their profile. The usernames are:
importContactsGoogle: Import your Google Contacts to Peerio
importContactsGoogleText: To get your Google contacts on Peerio, simply login to your Gmail account and follow these steps:
importContactsGoogleStep1: Click Gmail at the top-left corner of your Gmail page, then choose Contacts.
importContactsGoogleStep3: Choose whether to export all contacts or only one group.
importContactsGoogleStep4: Select the Google CSV format for exporting your contacts.
importContactsGoogleStep5: After you have exported your contacts into a CSV file, click the button below to upload it to Peerio.
importContactsConfirm: Peerio may send invites on your behalf
importContactsConfirmText: If you proceed, Peerio may send invitations on your behalf to contacts that are not yet on Peerio. Are you sure you want to send invites to these contacts?
importContactsErrorText: Invitations could not be sent to your contacts. Please verify your information and try again.
importContactsSuccessText: Your contacts will be invited on your behalf.
importContactsSelectToInviteText: If a contact is already on Peerio, they will be added to your account. Otherwise, an invitation will be sent on your behalf.
newFolderDialogText: What should this folder's name be?
creatingFolderError: Oops! Something went wrong and your folder was not created. Please try again.
renameFolderDialogText: What should this folder's new name be?
renamingFolderError: Oops! Something went wrong and your folder was not renamed. Please try again.
removeFolderDialogText1: Are you sure you want to remove the folder
removeFolderDialogText2: Conversations in this folder will be moved to 'inbox'.
removingFolderError: Oops! Something went wrong and your folder was not removed. Please try again.
conversationMoveError: Failed to move conversation into folder.
moveConversationsDialogText: conversations selected. Move to which folder?:
conversationsNotSelectedError: Please select at least one conversation to move.
movingConversationsError: Sorry, failed to move conversations to folder
moveFilesDialogText: files selected. Move to which folder?
movingFilesError: Sorry, failed to move files to folder
fileMoveError: Failed to move file into folder.
removeFileFolderDialogText2: Files in this folder will be moved to 'all files'.
folderExistsError: Folder with this name already exists
typePassphraseToConfirm: To accept this Master Password, please enter it below
passphraseConfirmFailed: Your Master Password was entered incorrectly. Please store your Master Password somewhere safe before continuing.
addAddressSuggestionText:
Adding alternative contact information allows for:
  • Discovery: Make it easier for your contacts to find you
  • Notifications: New message and contact notifications
  • Support: More support services from our Help Center

Would you like to update your addresses?
availableNowMobile: Available now for Android and iOS.
TOStext: By signing up for a Peerio account you agree to our terms of use.
TOStextUpdated: We've updated our terms of use! Please review and accept to continue.
notifications_note: Notifications will be sent to your primary address (email or phone).
address_phoneInvalid: Phone numbers require a country code
address_confirmCodePrompt: Please enter the code you received
address_confirmCodePrompt2: Please enter the code you received on your email or phone
address_conformCodeError: Confirmation code does not match. Would you like to try again?
address_addingError: Error adding address. Please contact support.
address_taken: Sorry, that address is already taken
address_removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this address?
address_makePrimary: Tap an address to make it your primary.
account_deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
contact_importWarning: Your contact list will be shared with Peerio. This information is only used to help you find your contacts on Peerio and will be wiped immediately after importing. Would you like to proceed?
contact_emailSent: We've sent an invite email to {email}
contact_permissionMissing: Please allow Peerio to access your device contacts to use the contact import feature.
contact_addressNotFound: Sorry, it looks like <emphasis>{address}</> is not signed up for Peerio.
contact_nothingFound: Sorry, there were no results matching your search. Try searching for contacts again by their email, username, or phone number.
contact_removeConfirmText: Are you sure you want to remove {username} from contacts? You will not be able to message and share files with this contact after removal.
contact_listEmpty: You don't have any contacts yet! Click below to get started.
error_invite: Error sending an invite. Please contact support.
error_messageDelivery: Failed to deliver message to following recipients:
error_addressFormat: Sorry, that doesn't look like a valid email or phone number.
login_forgetUsername: Tap to switch users or forget username.
setup_contactInfoDescription: Help your contacts find you on Peerio, receive notifications, and enable support services by adding your email address or phone number
setup_passcodeDescription: This allows you to login <emphasis>from this device</> without entering your Master Password.
setup_startDescription: In order to optimize your experience, we recommend you complete this short, 3 step, setup wizard.
setup_startDescription2: All steps are optional. You can safely exit the wizard at any point and skip steps that don't apply to you.
setup_touchDescription: Touch ID requires using your Apple Keychain.
setup_touchTitle: Would you like to enable Touch ID?
setup_touchWarning: Note on law enforcement. In Oct. 2014, a USA court ruled that a police officer can demand you to unlock your device with a fingerprint but not an alphanumeric password. Similar laws may exist in other national or regional jurisdictions and should be considered if law enforcement is part of your threat model.
setup_importDescription: Find out which of your contacts are already using Peerio.
signup_TOSRequestText: By creating a Peerio account, you agree to our <tosLink>terms of use</>.
signup_TOSRequestTextdesktop: By creating a Peerio account, you agree to our terms of use.
signup_nextPassphrase: I don't like this Master Password
signup_optInDescription: By enabling anonymous data collection, we will collect non-identifying and non-content information to share with researchers and improve Peerio.
signup_optInDescription2: If you opt-in, you will receive 25MB of bonus storage everyday as thanks for your contribution.
signup_optInHeadline: Would you like to help us with usability research?
signup_optInPolicy: <emphasis>Tap here</> to learn which data we collect.
signup_passphraseDescription: This is your secure randomly generated Master Password. If you lose it, you will <emphasis>permanently</> lose access to your account.
signup_showPassphrase: Let me see my Master Password again
tosUpdateRequestText: We've updated our terms of service! Please review and accept to continue using Peerio.
openLinkWarning: Warning! Please only open links from the contacts you trust.
file_listEmptyText: Peerio lets you store files in the cloud securely. Try it out by uploading a file.
file_removeConfirmText: This file will be deleted from your device and cloud, but will still be available to users who you have shared it with.
file_removeLocalConfirmText: This file will be deleted from your device, but will still be available to users who you have shared it with.
file_nukeConfirmText: This file will be deleted from your device, cloud and from the clouds of other users who you have shared it with.
file_sizeWarningTextDownload: Downloading files over 100MB on mobile devices may cause Peerio to crash. We are working to solve this issue. Would you still like to try downloading this file?
file_sizeWarningTextUpload: Uploading files over 100MB on mobile devices may cause Peerio to crash. We are working to solve this issue. Would you still like to try uploading this file?
file_locationLocal: On this device (decrypted) and in the cloud (encrypted)
appUpdate_normal: An update is available, would you like to get the latest version of Peerio?
appUpdate_critical: Your Peerio client is out-of-date and canâ€™t connect to the server, please update to connect!
2fa_protectedOperation: The operation you requested is protected by 2FA. Please enter the six digit code that appears in your authenticator app
2fa_prompt: Enter the six digit code that appears in your authenticator app
2fa_addressRequired: You don't have a registered contact address. If you lose your 2FA, Peerio won't be able to recover your account.
2fa_clipboard: The following key has been copied to your clipboard. Please paste it in your authenticator app.
2fa_manualCopy: Copy and paste the following secret key into your authenticator app
conversation_noParticipants: There are no participants left in this conversation
conversation_withSelf: You are the only person in this conversation.
conversation_confirmDelete: Are you sure you want do delete this conversation? You will no longer receive messages or files within this conversation.
conversation_emptyList: Now you can communicate securely! Add a contact to start sending Peerio messages, or you can send a Ghost by tapping the button below and entering any email address as your recipient.
message_selectContacts: Please select at least one contact to send your message to.
sync_description: For optimal experience and performance Peerio stores some of your encrypted data on your device. This may take a moment if you have a lot of messages.
coupon_invalid: Sorry, the coupon doesn't seem to be valid.
coupon_prompt: If you have a promotional code, please enter it below.
passcode_removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove your PIN?
passcode_enter: Login faster by setting a Device PIN
passcode_tooSimple: PIN is too simple, try again
settings_optIn: By enabling anonymous data collection, we will collect non-identifying and non-content information to share with researchers and improve Peerio. When you opt in, we will add 25MB to your account everyday as thanks for your contribution.
shareText: I'd like to securely share messages and files with you on Peerio!
inviteNote: When one of your contacts signs up for Peerio with the address you invited, they will automatically receive a contact request from you and you will receive 500MB of bonus storage. You can earn up to 10GB of free storage this way!
touch_keychain: Enabling Touch ID requires using your keychain, would you like to proceed?
payments_loadingError: Error loading payment plans. Please contact Peerio support.
payments_operationErrorNative: There was an error processing payment on your phone. Please check your device settings or contact Peerio support.
payments_operationErrorRemote: There was an error processing your payment on Peerio servers. Please contact Peerio support.
androidEncryptionStatusOff: Your device supports full disk encryption, but it is not currently enabled. Peerio highly recommends the use of disk encryption. Would you like to learn more?
androidEncryptionStatusPartial: Your device has encryption turned on but your PIN is still set to the default. We recommend setting a unique PIN. Would you like to learn more?
androidEncryptionStatusUnsupported: Your device does not support encryption. We recommend upgrading to a version of Android which does. Would you like to learn more?
serverWarning_Welcome_mobile: A Pro Plan has been registered to your account. You can view your plan benefits and learn how to manage your account at https://peerio.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/208395556
serverWarning_Welcome: A Pro Plan has been registered to your account. You can view your plan benefits and learn how to manage your account.
serverWarning_Cancelled: Your Peerio Pro plan has been cancelled. Your Pro benefits will expire on the end date of your plan and your plan will not be renewed.
serverWarning_ExpireTitle: Your Pro Plan Will Expire Soon
serverWarning_Expire: Your Peerio Pro plan will expire in 7 days. Please renew your plan to ensure your service is uninterrupted. If you do not renew and have stored more data than what is offered in Peerio's free service, you may experience limited functionality until your account is within its storage limit.
serverWarning_PaymentError: Your Peerio Pro plan could not be renewed due to a problem with your payment method. Please review your account information at https://account.peerio.com
serverWarning_QuotaExcceded: You're over your storage limit! Your account will have limited functionality until you purchase additional storage or remove some files from your account.
serverWarning_recoveryReminder: To access Peerio on other devices, you will need to use your account's master password that can be found in your settings. Visit our help center to learn more.
serverWarning_recoveryReminder_mobile: To access Peerio on other devices, you will need to use your account's master password that can be found in your settings. Visit our help center to learn more. https://peerio.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/214633103
ghost_sent_msg: Your Ghost will visit {ghost-recipient} for {ghost-expiry-days} and then disappear forever
ghost_passphrase_share: Ghosts are good at keeping secrets! To read your message, your recipient will need to know this Ghost's password
ghost_passphrase_share_helper: For security, send this password over a separate channel
ghost_passphrase_share_link: Didnâ€™t get the email? Want to share with someone else?
ghost_mobile_sent: Your message has been sent to
ghost_mobile_sent_share: Ghosts are good at keeping secrets! To read your message, your recipient will need to know this Ghost's password
ghost_loadFail: Ghost could not be opened. Please check your password.
ghost_notFound: Ghost ID not found, it might be expired or invalid.
contactUs: Contact us on Peerio at username <emphasis>Peerio</>
ghostTip: Ghosts allow you to send secure messages to anyone, even if they don't have Peerio!
ghost_enterMode: If you enter an email address as a recipient, you can send them Ghosts in this mode
newGhostRecipientErrorText: Please enter a valid email address.
newGhostSendErrorText: Your Ghost could not be sent.
ghostOverQuota: You've used your five Ghosts for the month. Upgrade to Peerio Pro to become a Ghost-whisperer and send as many Ghosts as you like!
ghostOnboardText: You can now send secure messages to anyone, even if they don't have Peerio! When composing a message, enter an email address instead of a Peerio contact and a Ghost will deliver your message. <ghostLink>Learn more</>.
error_onlyPeerioUser: Peerio messages can only be sent to other Peerio users. To send a Ghost, remove all recipients and enter a valid email address.
error_onlyPeerioUserFile: At the moment, files in your cloud can only be sent to other Peerio users. If you wish to send a file with a Ghost, please remove all attachments, enter a valid email address, and then upload files.
error_onlyGhostUser: By entering an email address as a recipient you have entered Ghost mode! Please enter a valid email address, or if you wish to send a Peerio message, please remove your current recipients and enter Peerio usernames instead.
error_recipientFormat: Sorry, we couldn't find a Peerio user or email address associated with that name in your contacts.
downloadPeerioContent: <url>Download our mobile and desktop apps</> for more features like encrypted messaging, emails, file sharing, and cloud storage.
ghostCountUpdate: You have <emphasis>{ghostsLeft}</> Ghosts left this month
paywallMsg: You've used all your Ghosts for the month.
paywallUpgrade: Upgrade to Peerio Pro to unlock unlimited Ghosts.
passphrase_notset: Your Master Password is not saved
passphrase_enternewpin: Set a PIN for this device
PINSetupRequired: Login faster by setting a Password for this device. If this is not a device you use regularly you can skip this step.
